alert.note: Alert for Perry (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 18 at 10:10AM EDT until July 18 at 10:45AM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 AM EDT/945 AM CDT/ FOR NORTHWESTERN HARRISON...SOUTHEASTERN CRAWFORD... NORTHEASTERN PERRY AND NORTH CENTRAL MEADE COUNTIES... At 1009 AM EDT/909 AM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located near Carefree Town, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Carefree Town, Leavenworth, New Amsterdam, Oriole, Moberly, Fredonia, Beechwood, White Cloud, West Fork and Switzer Crossroads. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
